== What is Inno JSON Parser ==

Inno JSON Parser is a simple DLL library, which can extend *[http://jrsoftware.org/ishelp/index.php?topic=unicode Unicode versions]* of a famous *[http://www.jrsoftware.org/isinfo.php/ Inno Setup]* installer<br>
of JSON parsing capabilities. It's written in Delphi 2009, based on very well known *[https://code.google.com/p/superobject/ SuperObject]* JSON parser.

== Features ==

  * create and edit *[http://www.json.org/ JSON]* files
  * read and write Unicode string, boolean, integer and float values using value paths
